page.title: 19Occupations PT
page.content:
In{Eppleby}there is not much unemployment. Most of the jobs are in Eppleby, Darlington and Forcett. The people who don't have jobs are female because they are married. They are housewives with children to look after. The most popular jobs are farmwork, farriers and people who drive machines. The farthest away job is in London. Most of the jobs are jobs that people do outside.
In{Caldwell}also there is little unemployment. Most of the jobs are in Caldwell, Darlington, Barnard Castle and Catterick Garrison. The people who don't have jobs are housewives or pensioners. The most popular jobs are agriculture, builders and laboratory workers.
